com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps

Interface MapboxMap.OnMapLongClickListener

  • Enclosing class:
    MapboxMap

    public static interface MapboxMap.OnMapLongClickListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the user long clicks on the map view.
    See Also:
    MapboxMap.addOnMapLongClickListener(OnMapLongClickListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onMapLongClick(LatLng point)
      Called when the user long clicks on the map view.

    • Method Detail

      • onMapLongClick

        boolean onMapLongClick(@NonNull
                       LatLng point)
        Called when the user long clicks on the map view.
        Parameters:
        point - The projected map coordinate the user long clicked on.
        Returns:
        True if this click should be consumed and not passed further to other listeners registered afterwards, false otherwise.
